57  class GeneralEquations
58  {
59  public:
60 
62  struct SatData
63  {
64  std::vector<SatID> satellite;
65  std::vector<double> elevation;
66  std::vector<bool> csflag;
67  std::vector<bool> lockflag;
68 
69  void addData(SatID sat, double eleva=0.0, double cflag=0.0,
70  bool lflag=false)
71  {
72  satellite.push_back(sat);
73  elevation.push_back(eleva);
74  csflag.push_back(cflag);
75  lockflag.push_back(lflag);
76  }
77 
78  int indexOfSat(const SatID& sat) const;
79  int indexOfReferenceSat(double minElev = 90.0);
80  int indexOfReferenceSat( SatID oldSat,
81  double minElev = 35.0 );
82 
83  };

104  ConstraintSystem getConstraintSystem()

107 
109  ConstraintSystem getConstraintSystem(gnssRinex& gRin)
110  {
111  gnssDataMap gdsMap; gdsMap.addGnssRinex(gRin);
112  updateSourceSatDataMap(gdsMap);
113  ConstraintSystem toReturn = getConstraints(gRin);
114  remarkCycleSlip(gRin);
115 
116  return toReturn;
117  }
118 
119 
121  ConstraintSystem getConstraintSystem(gnssDataMap& gdsMap)
122  {
123  updateSourceSatDataMap(gdsMap);
124  ConstraintSystem toReturn = getConstraints(gdsMap);
125  remarkCycleSlip(gdsMap);
126 
127  return toReturn;
128  }

132  GeneralEquations& setCoordinatesStatic()
133  {
134  pCoordXStoModel = &defaultStochasticModel;
135  pCoordYStoModel = &defaultStochasticModel;
136  pCoordZStoModel = &defaultStochasticModel;
137 
138  return (*this);
139  };
140 
141  GeneralEquations& setCoordinatesKinematic(double sigmaX,
142  double sigmaY,
143  double sigmaZ)
144  {
145  defaultXCoordinatesModel.setSigma(sigmaX);
146  defaultYCoordinatesModel.setSigma(sigmaY);
147  defaultZCoordinatesModel.setSigma(sigmaZ);
148 
149  pCoordXStoModel = &defaultXCoordinatesModel;
150  pCoordYStoModel = &defaultYCoordinatesModel;
151  pCoordZStoModel = &defaultZCoordinatesModel;
152 
153  return (*this);
154  };

381 
382 
383  EquationSystem GeneralEquations::getPPPEquations(const SourceID& source)
384  {
385  Variable dx(TypeID::dLat, pCoordXStoModel, true, false, 100.0);
386  Variable dy(TypeID::dLon, pCoordYStoModel, true, false, 100.0);
387  Variable dz(TypeID::dH, pCoordZStoModel, true, false, 100.0);
388 
389  Variable cdt(TypeID::cdt,pClockStoModel,true,false,4e14,+1.0,true);
390  Variable trop(TypeID::wetMap,pTropStoModel,true,false,0.25);
391  Variable amb(TypeID::BLC,pBiasStoModelLC,true,true,4e14,1.0,true);
392 
393  //((PhaseAmbiguityModel*)pBiasStoModelLC)->setWatchSatArc(false);
394 
395  Variable prefitPC(TypeID::prefitC);
396  Variable prefitLC(TypeID::prefitL);
397 
398  Equation equPCRover( prefitPC );
399  equPCRover.addVariable(dx);
400  equPCRover.addVariable(dy);
401  equPCRover.addVariable(dz);
402  equPCRover.addVariable(cdt);
403  equPCRover.addVariable(trop);
404 
405  equPCRover.header.equationSource = source;
406 
407  // Rover phase equation description
408  Equation equLCRover( prefitLC );
409  equLCRover.addVariable(dx);
410  equLCRover.addVariable(dy);
411  equLCRover.addVariable(dz);
412  equLCRover.addVariable(cdt);
413  equLCRover.addVariable(trop);
414  equLCRover.addVariable(amb);
415 
416  equLCRover.setWeight(10000.0); // 100.0 * 100.0
417  equLCRover.header.equationSource = source;
418 
419  // Setup equation system
420  EquationSystem system;
421  system.addEquation(equPCRover);
422  system.addEquation(equLCRover);
423 
424  return system;
425 
426  } // GeneralEquations::getPPPEquations()
427 
428 } // End of namespace gpstk
